name: Nature's Little Guardian
title: Minimal Land Protection
description: In 2018, only 0.05% of Micronesia's land was designated as protected areas, highlighting a need for increased conservation efforts.

name: Money Matters
title: Broad Money Growth
description: By 2021, Micronesia's broad money supply reached 332 million LCU, indicating a stable monetary environment.

name: Low Interest, Low Gain
title: Minimal Deposit Interest Rates
description: In 2021, deposit interest rates were at a low 0.04%, reflecting limited returns for savers.

name: Taxing Times
title: Limited Tax Revenue
description: Micronesia collected 26.2 million LCU in tax revenue in 2020, suggesting room for fiscal growth.

name: Employee Expenses
title: Employee Compensation Costs
description: In 2020, the compensation of employees amounted to 22.9 million LCU, a significant portion of government expenses.

name: Debt Duty
title: Minimal Interest Payments
description: Interest payments were just 523,714 LCU in 2020, indicating low debt servicing costs.

name: Expense Expansion
title: Government Spending
description: Total government expenses reached 87.4 million LCU in 2020, reflecting significant public sector investment.

name: Subsidy Support
title: Subsidies and Transfers
description: In 2020, subsidies and other transfers totaled 6.7 million LCU, supporting social welfare.

name: Disconnected Dials
title: Low Mobile Subscriptions
description: With only 19.4 mobile subscriptions per 100 people in 2021, connectivity remains a challenge.

name: Financial Footprint
title: FISIM Growth
description: The Financial Intermediary Services Indirectly Measured (FISIM) was valued at 3.7 million LCU in 2023, showing financial sector activity.

name: Manufacturing Moves
title: Manufacturing Value
description: In 2023, manufacturing value added was 2.3 million US$, highlighting a budding industrial sector.

name: Industry Insights
title: Industry Value Added
description: Industry, including construction, contributed 9.1 million LCU in value added in 2023, indicating economic diversification.

name: Education Elevation
title: High Education Expenditure
description: Education expenditure was 23.6% of GNI in 2021, showcasing a strong commitment to education.

name: Safe Streets
title: Low Traffic Mortality
description: With a road traffic mortality rate of 0.2 per 100,000 in 2019, Micronesia boasts safe roads.

name: Health Help
title: High External Health Expenditure
description: In 2022, 77.2% of health expenditure was externally funded, indicating reliance on international aid.

name: Export Enigma
title: Minimal Middle East Exports
description: In 2021, exports to the Middle East & North Africa were negligible, at 0.00001% of total merchandise exports.
